welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Ilkley, where the charm of the Yorkshire Dales and our famous Cow and Calf rocks await you. We invite you to explore our picturesque town and immerse yourself in its beauty."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport is primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by selecting the network and agreeing to the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linton-On-Ouse Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
